title: Head Shaking Horizontally

adjectives: Used to show a negative or disagreeing emotion.
verbs: Represents shaking the head side to side to indicate 'no'.

description: A smiling face shaking its head from side to side to say 'no'. Often used to convey disapproval, disbelief, or gentle refusal.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the head shaking horizontally emoji shows a familiar smiling face subtly moving side to side. The animation or visual flow suggests a clear 'no' response, with soft gradients and polished 3D styling characteristic of Apple‚Äôs emoji design. It represents polite disagreement, refusal, or disbelief expressed through motion.
